trans-unit.source: A set of machine learning APIs for different algorithms.
trans-unit.target: 一套针对不同算法的机器学习API。

trans-unit.source: APL package
trans-unit.target: APL包

trans-unit.source: Call SAP HANA Machine Learning Algorithms.
trans-unit.target: 调用SAP HANA机器学习算法。

trans-unit.target: 从pandas DataFrame转换到HANA DataFrame。

trans-unit.source: Convert to pandas DataFrame.
trans-unit.target: 转换为pandas DataFrame。

trans-unit.source: For HANA single-tenant databases, the port number is 3NN15.
trans-unit.target: 对于HANA单租户数据库，端口号为3 NN 15。

trans-unit.source: For HANA system databases in a multitenant system, the port number is 3NN13.
trans-unit.target: 对于多租户系统中的HANA系统数据库，端口号为3 NN 13。

trans-unit.source: For HANA tenant databases, use the port number 3NN13 (where NN is the SAP instance number - e.g. 30013).
trans-unit.target: 对于HANA租户数据库，使用端口号3 NN 13（其中NN是SAP实例号-例如30013）。

trans-unit.source: Python Machine Learning Client for SAP HANA
trans-unit.target: 面向SAP HANA的Python机器学习客户端

trans-unit.source: Quick Start
trans-unit.target: 快速入门

trans-unit.source: Return a DataFrame from select statement.
trans-unit.target: 从选择语句中返回一个DataFrame。

trans-unit.source: Return a DataFrame referenced to SAP HANA table.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个引用到SAP HANA表的DataFrame。

trans-unit.source: See the [SAP HANA ML API Reference] (https://help.sap.com/doc/1d0ebfe5e8dd44d09606814d83308d4b/2.0.05/en-US/hana_ml.html) for details about developing with the SAP HANA ML API.
trans-unit.target: 有关使用SAP HANA ML API进行开发的详细信息，请参见[SAP HANA ML API参考]（https://help.sap.com/doc/1d0ebfe5e8dd44d09606814d83308d4b/2.0.05/en-US/hana_ml.html）。

trans-unit.source: The Automated Predictive Library (APL) package exposes the data mining capabilities of the Automated Analytics engine in SAP HANA through a set of functions. These functions develop a predictive modeling process that analysts can use to answer simple questions on their customer datasets stored in SAP HANA.
trans-unit.target: Automated Predictive Library (APL)包通过一组函数暴露了 SAP HANA 中 Automated Analytics 引擎的数据挖掘功能。这些函数开发了一个预测建模过程,分析人员可以用它来回答存储在SAP HANA中的客户数据集的简单问题。

trans-unit.source: The Predictive Analysis Library (PAL) package consists of a set of Python algorithms and functions which provide access to the machine learning capabilities in SAP HANA. The PAL Python functions cover a variety of different machine learning algorithms for training a model and then the trained model is used for scoring. For details on which specific algorithms are available in this release, please refer to the documentation.
trans-unit.target: Predictive Analysis Library (PAL)包由一组Python算法和函数组成,提供了对SAP HANA中机器学习功能的访问。PAL的Python函数涵盖了各种不同的机器学习算法,用于训练模型,然后将训练好的模型用于打分。有关该版本中哪些具体算法可用的细节,请参考文档。

trans-unit.source: The Python Client API for Machine Learning consists of two main parts:
trans-unit.target: 机器学习的Python客户端API由两大部分组成。

trans-unit.source: The SAP HANA DataFrame, which provides a set of methods for analyzing data in SAP HANA without bringing the data to the client.
trans-unit.target: SAP HANA DataFrame,它提供了一套在SAP HANA中分析数据的方法,而无需将数据带到客户端。

trans-unit.source: The SAP HANA ML API is provided via the [SAP Developer License Agreement] (https://tools.hana.ondemand.com/developer-license-3_1.txt).
trans-unit.target: SAP HANA ML API是通过[SAP开发人员许可协议]（https://tools.hana.ondemand.com/developer-license-3_1.txt）提供的。

trans-unit.source: The SAP HANA Python Client API for machine learning algorithms provides a set of client-side Python functions for accessing and querying SAP HANA data, and a set of functions for developing machine learning models.
trans-unit.target: 用于机器学习算法的 SAP HANA Python 客户端 API 提供了一组用于访问和查询 SAP HANA 数据的客户端 Python 函数,以及一组用于开发机器学习模型的函数。

trans-unit.source: This Python library uses the SAP HANA Python driver (hdbcli) to connect to and access SAP HANA.
trans-unit.target: 这个Python库使用SAP HANA的Python驱动(hdbcli)来连接和访问SAP HANA。

trans-unit.source: This set of APIs is composed of two packages:
trans-unit.target: 这套API由两个包组成。

trans-unit.source: Welcome to the SAP HANA Python Client API for machine learning algorithms. This API enables Python data scientists to access SAP HANA data and build machine learning models using that data directly in SAP HANA.
trans-unit.target: 欢迎使用SAP HANA Python客户端API,用于机器学习算法。该API使Python数据科学家能够访问SAP HANA数据,并直接在SAP HANA中使用该数据构建机器学习模型。
